name: FORSISTED: The Sacred Souls
description:
FORSISTED is a psychological horror game that tells the story of a criminal from the past who has to face the terrible curse of his deeds in a haunted mansion. Get ready for a dark adventure full of remorse and lurking ghosts.

Story

In the crime-ridden town of Ravenwood, notorious outlaw Vinn Xander's reign of terror comes to an end when he is finally caught during a botched heist. Sentenced to the dreaded Ravenwood Penitentiary, he is given a chance at redemption by detective Jack Neil, who recruits him to investigate a long-cursed mansion. With a unique communication tool, Vinn must navigate the secrets of the eerie mansion and face evil spirits as he uncovers the dark history and tries to break the prison's curse.


Game Features:

  • Realistic graphics
Realistic graphics, enveloping players in a chilling nightmare. The dynamic lighting system casts eerie, shifting shadows that play tricks on the player's senses, with pitch-black corners where unseen terrors may lurk and realistic volumetric fog that obscures vision just enough to create suspense and anticipation.

  • immersive sound design
Sound design seamlessly integrates with the graphics, further intensifying the horror experience. Realistic audio cues accompany terrifying visuals, such as echoing footsteps, distant whispers, and bone-chilling cries, immersing players in an auditory nightmare.

  • Multiple Endings
Your choices in this haunting narrative will plunge you deeper into the abyss. With different and horrifying endings, each playthrough will lead you into a new madness, ensuring no two nightmares are the same.

Game genre: Horror, Walking simulator.
Average time to complete the game: 170min
